comments:
A ClassCastException occurs when trying to end recording after a set is 
performed on an EList, e.g. setting the value of a given index on the contents 
of an annotation. A simple test class illustrating the problem is attached. 
Here is the stack trace:

java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.change.util.ChangeRecorder.finalizeChange
(ChangeRecorder.java:534)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.change.util.ChangeRecorder.endRecording
(ChangeRecorder.java:127)

(BasicCommandStack.java:91)

org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection

(ActionContributionItem.java:850)

Kenn,

Thanks for the test case.  The fix is committed to CVS.
The fix is available in the latest driver.
